body: Today i was playing casual game on Nebula, and there happend to be a "Hacker"on and he was flying and breaking monuments, and he admitted he was hacking, and i took a screen shot of him saying that, and I was wondering if it would be worth my while of posting that pic so the staff can take action. Should I?
body_tagged: Today i was playing casual game on Nebula, and there happend to be a "Hacker"on and he was flying and breaking monuments, and he admitted he was hacking, and i took a screen shot of him saying that, and I was wondering if it would be worth my while of posting that pic so the staff can take action. Should I?
title: Question for the staff

replies.body: Did you report him/her in game?
replies.body_tagged: Did you report him/her in game?

replies.body: If someone says that they hack, they could just be trolling, so it is not punishable, unless you have proof of them actually hacking.
replies.body_tagged: If someone says that they hack, they could just be trolling, so it is not punishable, unless you have proof of them actually hacking.

replies.body:
Many players joke around when it comes to hacks. This evidence wouldn't be sufficient enough for a punishment.
Us Mods have to see them actually using the hacks that they supposedly "stated" they have, so we can take further action.
It's highly recommended that you post a video ^-^ to the "Player Reports" section.^.^
replies.body_tagged:
Many players joke around when it comes to hacks. This evidence wouldn't be sufficient enough for a punishment.
Us Mods have to see them actually using the hacks that they supposedly "stated" they have, so we can take further action.
It's highly recommended that you post a video ^-^ to the "Player Reports" section.^.^

replies.body: Locking, since your question has been answered. ^-^
replies.body_tagged: Locking, since your question has been answered. ^-^
